alert.note: Alert for Escambia; Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 30 at 2:28PM EST until December 30 at 3:15PM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Southern Escambia County in south central Alabama... Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 215 PM CST. * At 127 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles north of I65 And AL 21 to 6 miles south of Century to 3 miles southwest of Gonzalez to Gulf Shores, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Warrington, Gonzalez, Pace, Milton, Gulf Breeze, Orange Beach, Goulding, Century, Flomaton, Bagdad, Lillian, Myrtle Grove, Oriole Beach, Navarre and Molino. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
